feed.title: 4ga Boards Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.3
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🌟 feat: Added GitHub SSO 38b9c6e - 🌟 feat: Added Microsoft SSO 95b667f - 🐝 refactor: Simplified SSO workflow 435c813 - 🐞 fix: FIxed login ssoUrls b755cc8 - 🐞 fix: CardModal task add b2d711c - 🐞 fix: Fixed multiple popup style issues b0a03d6 - 🌟 feat: Added an option to assign password, email, username if user is only sso-based c3abbd8 - 🌟 feat: SSO standardized b11dcdd - 📖 [PATCH] docs: Readme 8407a8e

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.3

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.4
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🐞 [PATCH] fix: SSO Login without displayName 3e2b48e

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.4

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.5
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 💄 chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-config-prettier from 10.1.2 to 10.1.5, eslint-plugin-perfectionist from 4.12.3 to 4.13.0 f6df5fd - 💄 chore(deps): Bump bcrypt from 5.1.1 to 6.0.0 in /server 4f24653 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump lint-staged from 15.5.1 to 16.0.0 568aea4 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump i18next related-packages e491af9 - 💄 chore(deps): Bump react-router from 7.5.2 to 7.6.0 in /client cc239bc - 🌟 feat: Added optional env variables to docker compose, values.yaml, Added log level eea97e5 - 🌟 feat: Added option to disable creating projects by non-admin users bc1f432 - 🌟 feat: Disabled i18n server-side 44b4974 - 📖 - 📖 docs: Added DEMO_MODE to docker-cmpose, values.yaml, env.sample 89fbade - 🐞 fix: Fixed bug preventing adding due date to task on some browsers 924be6f - 🌟 feat: Marked current date on calendar 20d3287 - 🐝 refactor: focus preventScroll b1132d0 - 🐝 refactor: getting core settings 24e3e6a - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Promote 4ga Boards GitHub in demo mode, fix: Calendar today color 2989c4a - 🎨 style: Changed Github link demo mode 324cca5 - 📄 [PATCH] Release 6563b6a

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.5

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.6
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 🌟 feat: Changed sidebar toggle location (for easier mobile access) 3683dd9 - 🐞 fix: Server-side check for localUserRegistration 774dc9d - 🐞 fix: Added proper check to send messageDismiss action less frequently 4a9c2b0 - 🌟 feat: Updated demo mode to get some feedback 9ede171 - 🌟 feat: Added default settings for registration and project creation fe75023 - 🐞 fix: Migration file name missing 4457ac3 - 🐞 - 🌟 feat: Added DEFAULT_ADMIN settings, fix: Some defaults inconsistencies 12200d9 - 📄 [PATCH] Release 1a79f0a

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.6

entry.title: New release for 4ga Boards: 4ga Boards 3.2.7
entry.content:
Changes since last release: - 📖 - 📖 docs: Updated all deployment config files with docs link instead of inline explanations b2db737 - 📖 - 📖 docs: Added socials 21bbc01 - 🌟 [PATCH] feat: Added socials to AboutSettings 98b4413

Install this release using: docker pull ghcr.io/rargames/4gaboards:3.2.7
